citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 pm on
02-Jan-18.
Inspector knocked on the front door and rang the doorbell. Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone and
left message. Departed at 3:53 pm. Licensee did return phone call and stated she was not available.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15 pm on
02-Jan-18.
Inspector knocked on the front door and rang the doorbell.  Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone and
left message.  Departed at 3:53 pm.  Licensee did return phone call and stated she was not available.
